text:
@CNN @ChrisCuomo Oh man, I'm glad you're back!  I hope the rest of your family is OK.  I heard from your bro @NYGovCuomo that others caught #COVID19 at home.  Stay healthy.

PS. I'm glad you & your bro are around in this madness.  You both so remind me of your dad. A great man; great sons.
